mil7.2.6:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘kummassa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.2.6:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, kummo udakacaro udakeyeva vasam kappeti;
mil7.2.6:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbapanabhutapuggalanam hitanukampina mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena sabbavantam lokam pharitva viharitabbam.
mil7.2.6:1.4: Idam, maharaja, kummassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.6:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, kummo udake uppilavanto sisam ukkhipitva yadi koci passati, tattheva nimujjati galhamogahati ‘ma mam te puna passeyyun’ti;
mil7.2.6:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kilesesu opatantesu arammanasare nimujjitabbam galhamogahitabbam ‘ma mam kilesa puna passeyyun’ti.
mil7.2.6:2.3: Idam, maharaja, kummassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.6:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, kummo udakato nikkhamitva kayam otapeti;
mil7.2.6:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena nisajjatthanasayanacankamato manasam niharitva sammappadhane manasam otapetabbam.
mil7.2.6:3.3: Idam, maharaja, kummassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.6:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, kummo pathavim khanitva vivitte vasam kappeti;
mil7.2.6:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena labhasakkarasilokam pajahitva sunnam vivittam kananam vanapattham pabbatam kandaram giriguham appasaddam appanigghosam pavivittamogahitva vivitte yeva vasam upagantabbam.
mil7.2.6:4.3: Idam, maharaja, kummassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.6:6.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, kummo carikam caramano yadi kanci passati va, saddam sunati va, sondipancamani angani sake kapale nidahitva appossukko tunhibhuto titthati kayamanurakkhanto;
mil7.2.6:6.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbattha rupasaddagandharasaphotthabbadhammesu apatantesu chasu dvaresu samvarakavatam anugghatetva manasam samodahitva samvaram katva satena sampajanena vihatabbam samanadhammam anurakkhamanena.
mil7.2.6:6.3: Idam, maharaja, kummassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.6:6.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena samyuttanikayavare kummupamasuttante—
